Package BobcatLib.Subsystems.Climbers.Modules

Interface ClimberIO

All Known Implementing Classes:
ClimberReal, ClimberSim
public interface ClimberIO
Interface for controlling and monitoring the climber mechanism of a robot.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static class 
    ClimberIO.ClimberIOInputs
    Data structure for storing inputs related to the climber mechanism.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default void
    configClimber()
    Configures the climber subsystem.
    default Rotation2d
    getPosition()
    Retrieves the current position of the climber mechanism.
    default void
    holdPos(double rot)
    Commands the climber to hold a specific position.
    default void
    setPercentOut(double percent)
    Sets the motor output percentage for the climber.
    default void
    setPosition(Rotation2d position)
    Sets the climber to a specified position.
    default void
    stop()
    Stops the climber mechanism by setting motor output to zero.
    default void
    updateInputs(ClimberIO.ClimberIOInputs inputs)
    Updates the input values of the climber for logging or telemetry purposes.

  • Method Details

    • configClimber

      default void configClimber()
      Configures the climber subsystem.

      This method is called to initialize or reset the climber configuration to default values.

    • updateInputs

      default void updateInputs(ClimberIO.ClimberIOInputs inputs)
      Updates the input values of the climber for logging or telemetry purposes.
      Parameters:
      inputs - The ClimberIO.ClimberIOInputs object containing updated input data.

    • setPercentOut

      default void setPercentOut(double percent)
      Sets the motor output percentage for the climber.
      Parameters:
      percent - The desired motor output as a percentage (-1.0 to 1.0).

    • holdPos

      default void holdPos(double rot)
      Commands the climber to hold a specific position.
      Parameters:
      rot - The desired position to hold, in rotations.

    • stop

      default void stop()
      Stops the climber mechanism by setting motor output to zero.

    • getPosition

      default Rotation2d getPosition()
      Retrieves the current position of the climber mechanism.
      Returns:
      The current position as a Rotation2d.

    • setPosition

      default void setPosition(Rotation2d position)
      Sets the climber to a specified position.
      Parameters:
      position - The target position as a Rotation2d object.
